description:
Nojiko continues the story of Nami`s younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikinuke! Haha Bellemere to Nami no Kizuna!
Il faut survivre ! Le lien éternel de Belmer et de Nami !
Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami`s Bond!
¡Sobrevivid! ¡Bellemere, la madre y familia de Nami!
Живите! Узы мамы Бэльмэр и Нами!
พวกเธอต้องรอด!
生き抜け! 母ベルメールとナミの絆!
